001package org.relationlearn.filters;
002
003import com.aliasi.tokenizer.LowerCaseTokenizerFactory;
004import com.aliasi.tokenizer.RegExTokenizerFactory;
005import com.aliasi.tokenizer.TokenizerFactory;
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import java.util.Arrays;
008import java.util.List;
009import org.relationlearn.util.TextUtils;
010import weka.core.Attribute;
011
012/**
013 * An implementation of TextFilter which returns the ratio of words that
014 * appear in both texts compared to the total number of different words found
015 * in both texts.
016 */
017public class CommonWordsFilter implements TextFilter {
018    
019    private final Attribute FILTER_ATTR;
020    
021    private final TokenizerFactory TOKENIZER;
022    
023    /**
024     * Constructs a CommonWordsFilter with the Attribute name set
025     * to "common-word-ratio".
026     * 
027     */
028    public CommonWordsFilter() {
029        this("common-word-ratio");
030    }
031    
032    /**
033     * Constructs a CommonWordsFilter with the Attribute name set
034     * to {@code name}.
035     * 
036     * @param name the name this TextFilter Attribute will have
037     */
038    public CommonWordsFilter(String name) {
039        this.FILTER_ATTR = new Attribute(name);
040        TokenizerFactory regToken = 
041                new RegExTokenizerFactory(TextUtils.WORDS_PATTERN);
042        TOKENIZER = new LowerCaseTokenizerFactory(regToken);
043    }
044    
045    @Override
046    public Attribute getMappedAttribute() {
047        return FILTER_ATTR;
048    }
049    
050    @Override
051    public double filter(String r, String h) {
052        List<String> rlst, hlst;
053        rlst = new ArrayList<>(Arrays.asList(
054                TextUtils.getTokensFromTextUsingFactory(r, TOKENIZER)));
055        hlst = new ArrayList<>(Arrays.asList(
056                TextUtils.getTokensFromTextUsingFactory(h, TOKENIZER)));
057        return getCommonWordRatio(rlst, hlst);
058    }
059    
060    private double getCommonWordRatio(List<String> rlst, List<String> hlst) {
061        int totalWords = 0, commonWords = 0;
062        String word;
063        for(int i = 0; i < rlst.size(); i++) {
064            word = rlst.get(i);
065            if(hlst.contains(word)) {
066                i--;
067                commonWords++;
068                totalWords++;
069                while(rlst.remove(word)){}
070                while(hlst.remove(word)){}
071            }
072        }
073        totalWords += (rlst.size() + hlst.size());
074        if(totalWords > 0) {
075            return ((double) commonWords / (double) totalWords);
076        } else {
077            return 0.0;
078        }
079    }
080
081}
